faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: If you can't find what you're looking for, reach out to our support team through the app or email us directly.

questions.question: How do I start contributing to Sikiya?
questions.answer: Download our mobile app from the App Store or Google Play Store. Once you create an account, you can start sharing articles, videos, and engaging with the community.

questions.question: Who can contribute content to Sikiya?
questions.answer: Anyone can contribute! We welcome journalists, writers, content creators, and anyone with insights about Africa. All content is subject to our community guidelines.

questions.question: Is Sikiya free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Sikiya is free for readers and contributors. We believe in making information accessible to everyone.

questions.question: How does Sikiya ensure content accuracy?
questions.answer: We have a verification process and hold journalists accountable for accurate reporting. Our community also helps flag any issues with content.

questions.question: What topics can I write about on Sikiya?
questions.answer: We focus on political, economic, social, and cultural dimensions shaping Africa. We welcome diverse perspectives and encourage meaningful dialogue.

questions.question: Can I use Sikiya on my computer?
questions.answer: Currently, Sikiya is available as a mobile app for iOS and Android. We are working on a web version for the future.

questions.question: How do I report inappropriate content?
questions.answer: You can report content directly through the app. Our moderation team reviews all reports to maintain a respectful and safe community environment.

questions.question: How can I contact Sikiya support?
questions.answer: You can reach out to us through the app or email us directly. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours.

questions.question: Does Sikiya have a journalist verification program?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a verification program for journalists. Verified journalists have additional features and their content is highlighted on the platform.
